content: this is a legal summary of a case involving a coownership property dispute the case was initially heard in the municipal court zagreb and is now being heard in the county court varaždin in the 2nd instance the court decided to sell the property through a public auction and distribute the proceeds among the coowners based on their ownership ratios the counterparty objected to the division but the court rejected their arguments and determined that the termination of the coownership was necessary the court also found that a geometric division of the property was not possible the property will now be sold through a public auction and the proceeds will be distributed proportionally among the coowners the counterparty challenged the courts decision but the appellate court upheld the decision
